title: Parallel testing plugin project config schema.
description: Parallel testing Jenkins plugin with Microsoft Azure Batch service. This schema defines the project configs for this plugin.

version.title: Version schema.
version.description: Version of this project config schema, current version is 0.1.

vmConfigs.title: VmConfigs schema.
vmConfigs.description: Configs for task VMs. In current version, only Windows VM may be allocated.

numVMs.title: NumVMs schema.
numVMs.description: Number of VMs to be created.

maxTasksPerNode.title: MaxTasksPerNode schema.
maxTasksPerNode.description: Max tasks allowed running on a VM at same time.

vmSize.title: VmSize schema.
vmSize.description: The size of the virtual machines in the pool. You may find more information at https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn820174.aspx, element vmSize.

cloudServiceConfig.title: CloudServiceConfig schema.
cloudServiceConfig.description: The cloud service configuration for the pool, for Azure PaaS VMs. You may find more information at https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn820174.aspx, cloudServiceConfiguration section.

osFamily.title: OsFamily schema.
osFamily.description: The Azure Guest OS family to be installed on the virtual machines in the pool. The default value is 4 â€“ OS Family 4, equivalent to Windows Server 2012 R2. You may find more information at https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn820174.aspx, cloudServiceConfiguration section, osFamily element.

targetOSVersion.title: TargetOSVersion schema.
targetOSVersion.description: The Azure Guest OS version to be installed on the virtual machines in the pool. The default value is * which specifies the latest operating system version for the specified family. You may find more information at https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn820174.aspx, cloudServiceConfiguration section, targetOSVersion element.

virtualMachineConfig.title: VirtualMachineConfig schema.
virtualMachineConfig.description: The virtual machine configuration for the pool, for Azure IaaS VMs. You may find more information at https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn820174.aspx, virtualMachineConfiguration section.

publisher.title: Publisher schema.
publisher.description: The publisher of the image to be installed on the virtual machines in the pool. You may find more information at https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn820174.aspx, imageReference section, publisher element.

offer.title: Offer schema.
offer.description: The offer of the image to be installed on the virtual machines in the pool. You may find more information at https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn820174.aspx, imageReference section, offer element.

sku.title: Sku schema.
sku.description: The SKU of the image to be installed on the virtual machines in the pool. You may find more information at https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn820174.aspx, imageReference section, sku element.

version.title: Version schema.
version.description: The version of the image to be installed on the virtual machines in the pool. You may find more information at https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn820174.aspx, imageReference section, version element.

nodeAgentSKUId.title: NodeAgentSKUId schema.
nodeAgentSKUId.description: The SKU of the Batch node agent that needs to be provisioned on the virtual machines in the pool. You may find more information at https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn820174.aspx, virtualMachineConfiguration section, nodeAgentSKUId element.

poolKeepAlive.title: PoolKeepAlive schema.
poolKeepAlive.description: Keep the VMs alive after all tests are done. Default is false. You may set to true if you want VMs alive for debugging purpose.

vmSetupCommandLine.title: VmSetupCommandLine schema.
vmSetupCommandLine.description: CommandLine to setup VM. This command will be run before any tests.

resources.title: Resources schema.
resources.description: Resources folders and files will be copied to task VMs under folder %AZ_BATCH_NODE_SHARED_DIR%\%AZ_BATCH_JOB_ID% before any test running.

localResources.title: LocalResources schema.
localResources.description: Files and Folders on local disk or remote share.

items.title: LocalResource schema.
items.description: File or Folder on local disk or remote share.

source.title: Source schema.
source.description: File or folder's absolute path or relative path to Jenkins WORKSPACE folder.

blob.title: Blob schema.
blob.description: The Azure storage blob path, which may not contain SAS.

sas.title: SAS schema.
sas.description: The Azure storage container/blob SAS for this blob. If not specified, plugin will try to generate container SAS for this blob with configured storage accouts. If it's public resourece, you may specify empty string as SAS.

unzip.title: Unzip schema.
unzip.description: Set to true if you want to unzip this blob on task VM. Default is false.

resultFilePatterns.title: ResultFilePatterns schema.
resultFilePatterns.description: Patterns of result files which will be downloaded to Jenkins server.

resultFilesSaveToFolder.title: ResultFilesSaveToFolder schema.
resultFilesSaveToFolder.description: The folder name of results files to be downloaded to Jenkins server.
